meanings.sent1: She pursued a postcollege internship to gain more experience.
meanings.sent2: Many students feel uncertain about their postcollege plans.
meanings.sent3: After her postcollege travels, she settled down to start her career.
meanings.sent4: The postcollege job market can be competitive and challenging.
meanings.sent5: His postcollege life was filled with new opportunities and adventures.

meanings.definition: A period of time after completing college education.
meanings.sent1: The postcollege years are often a time of transition and growth.
meanings.sent2: She decided to take a break during her postcollege phase.
meanings.sent3: The postcollege reunion brought back many memories of their university days.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the postcollege world can be both exciting and daunting.
meanings.sent5: During the postcollege period, she explored different career paths.
